name: DiPMU
description:
DiPMU is a metroidvania game in development. Expect bugs!!! 

Controls:

  • [Arrow Keys] - Move/Aim
  • [Z] - Jump
  • [X] - Fire 
  • [Spacebar] - Change Weapon
  • [Shift] - Pause Game
  • [F] - Fullscreen

Story:

Dr. Blobert Goopton, a green blob physicist, invented an A.I. unit called DiPMU (Dimensional and Particle Manipulation Unit) that went out of control. It began to morph the planet and all living creatures to its own means, now the world is doomed!  With the help of your personal assistant, DiPPA (Dimensional and Particle manipulation Personal Assistant), your mission is to search and destroy DiPMU in order to restore the planet and all living creatures back to their true form and habitat. 

Version Releases:

  • 0.1.0 - Foundational Development
  • 0.2.0 - Shiver caves
  • 0.3.0 - Flaming Hot Volcano (Current Release)
  • 0.4.0 - Design (In Progress)
  • 0.5.0 - Audio
  • 0.5.5 - Copywriting
  • 0.6.0 - Demo Release
